definition: Zhang Yining (1981-), PRC female table tennis player and Olympic gold medalist
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: Zhang Yining is famous in the world for her skills of playing pingpong.
sentences.chinese: 張怡寧以其乒乓球技術而聞名於世。

sentences.english: Zhang Yining and Guo Yan, both of China, picked bronze medals.
sentences.chinese: 張怡寧和郭燕獲得了此次比賽的銅牌。

sentences.english: A lot of Zhang Yining's time was by her training programme.
sentences.chinese: 張怡寧許多時間被她的訓練項目佔用。

sentences.english: Zhang Yining is quite a good player.
sentences.chinese: 張怡寧是一個十分優秀的運動員。

sentences.english: The idea pleased Zhang Yining, a table tennis player who is a household name in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國家喻戶曉的桌球名將張怡寧很欣賞這個構想。

sentences.english: As for what gift to Wang Nan , Zhang Yining not think good.
sentences.chinese: 至於送給王楠什麼禮物，張怡寧還沒有想好。

sentences.english: Zhang Yining won two gold medals in the Athens Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 張怡寧在奧運會上獲得兩枚金牌。
